descriptions.en: It is said that a dog Pokémon that died in the wild without ever interacting with a human was reborn as this Pokémon.
descriptions.es: It is said that a dog Pokémon that died in the wild without ever interacting with a human was reborn as this Pokémon.
descriptions.ca: Es diu que un Pokémon gos que va morir al bosc sense haver interactuat mai amb un humà va renéixer com aquest Pokémon.
